title: United Kingdom Imports - Mineral Fuels & Oils & Distillation Products
description: Imports - Mineral Fuels & Oils & Distillation Products in the United Kingdom decreased to 9750.76 GBP Million in September from 10449.13 GBP Million in August of 2022. Imports - Mineral Fuels & Oils & Distillation Prod in the United Kingdom averaged 3125.97 GBP Million from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 18906.83 GBP Million in March of 2022 and a record low of 638.48 GBP Million in December of 2001. This page includes a chart with historical data for the United Kingdom Imports of Mineral Fuels & Oils & Distillation Pr.
author: Hm Customs And Excise
